name: gud-website
description: ## Progress Done So Far:   - Set up the routing for the website   - Added the footer and navbar to the website pages   - Added sections to the landing page   - Added sections to the about page   - Added sections to the design team page ## Parts Left To Do:   - Finish the landing page by adding functionality to the carousel of images and the collapsable FAQ bar.   - Finish the our history section in the about section   - Add a basic skeleton to all the pages of the website
